title: Bathyphytophilus caribaeus
text:
Bathyphytophilus caribaeus is a <a href="species">species</a> of very small, deep water <a href="sea%20snail">sea snail</a>, a <a href="marine%20%28ocean%29">marine</a> <a href="gastropod">gastropod</a> <a href="mollusk">mollusk</a> in the <a href="family%20%28biology%29">family</a> <a href="Bathyphytophilidae">Bathyphytophilidae</a>, the false <a href="limpet">limpet</a>s.
Distribution.
This is a deep-water species occurring in the <a href="Caribbean%20Sea">Caribbean Sea</a>.
Description.
The maximum recorded <a href="gastropod%20shell">shell</a> length is 2.8 mm.
Habitat.
Minimum recorded depth is 2450 m. Maximum recorded depth is 6740 m.
